replies.body: I like getting Bork for the early attack speed.  I'm still in a toss up between Bork+GB and Bork+shiv though.  Martial poise synergizes with shiv well, but the extra pen and AD from GB amps up your Q and E damage.  Bork+shiv+zerks also seems a bit too fast for her passive imo, but it may just be me not being used to it yet.
Haven't played her yet but surely you would have to start with Botrk for the attack speed to get as many spears impaled in the enemy for more rend damage.
